text: Bangwe ba rona ba neetswe neo ya botlhokwa go nna baaposetoloi; ba bangwe o ba neile neo ya go rera sentle; ba bangwe ba na le neo ya botlhokwa ya go gapela batho mo go Keresete, ba ba thusa gore ba mo ikanye e le Mmoloki wa bone; mme ba bangwe ba na le neo ya go tlhokomela batho ba Modimo jaaka modisa a tlhokomela dinku tsa gagwe, a ba goga a bile a ba ruta ka ditsela tsa Modimo.
